name: Charles BURGER, Appellant, v. John W. FORD and Amedeo Brancati, Appellees

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
parties: Charles BURGER, Appellant, v. John W. FORD and Amedeo Brancati, Appellees.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
Decree affirmed. Each side to pay own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Anthony J. Martin, Monroeville, for appellant.
August C. Damian, Pittsburgh, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
393 A.2d 433
Charles BURGER, Appellant, v. John W. FORD and Amedeo Brancati, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 26, 1978.
Decided Oct. 16, 1978.
Anthony J. Martin, Monroeville, for appellant.
August C. Damian, Pittsburgh, for appellees.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
